item.title: Biden visits Amazon rainforest, a first for an American president
item.description: Biden’s emphasis on climate change during his trip creates yet another contrast with Trump as the president prepares to leave office.

item.title: Kari Lake settles election defamation case brought by Arizona official
item.description: Stephen Richer, the election official and a lifelong Republican, had sued Lake, who made election denialism a centerpiece for her unsuccessful 2022 ca...

item.title: Ann Selzer to step away from Iowa Poll with the Des Moines Register
item.description: The pollster’s pre-election findings said Kamala Harris had a slight lead over Donald Trump in Iowa, which Trump went on to carry handily.

item.title: Musk appears to pressure Trump on Cabinet and tariffs, irking advisers
item.description: Elon Musk, the billionaire who has become Donald Trump’s “first buddy,” appeared to publicly pressure the president-elect on economic policy and a key...

item.title: Millions may not have health coverage if subsidies return to pre-Biden level
item.description: Millions of people might lose or drop their health coverage when a Biden-era expansion of ACA subsidies expires next year.
